trends: There have been 53 other sightings in Rochester
There were no other sightings in Rochester on or around July 2nd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette approximately 9:53 pm ET when i see this bright object moving through the sky very fast. At first i thought it was a satellite but it was brighter then all the other stars in the sky and brighter than any other satellite Ive seen in the night sky. I rush inside and turn the porch light off to get a better view(i was inside for less then 5 seconds) when i notice the object had changed direction. The object was coming from my left going to the right and when I came back out it was going away from me. The was doing a very slight zig-zag motion when it was moving away from me, then the object disappeared. I observed the object for about 1 minute.
Summary: Bright object, brighter then any satellite I have ever seen and brighter then any star in sky.
